i highly recommend whale watching with kayak adventures earlier this year i was fortunate enough to be able to go on this trip dont wait until youre not able i would have written review sooner but ive been dealing with health issues it was an amazing experience to be able to interact with the whales as well as camp at magdalena bay ive never seen stars so bright and to be able to wake up and see the whales just off the bay is an amazing experience we also got to interact with the calves what precious moment this outfit is very professional the guides were knowledgeable the food was great and i always felt the whales were given space when appropriate

im very sad to review beautiful mexican town like this but all the colors people food nor beach justify the sewage odor garbage and dead fauna i saw dead fish and rays the town needs help from the government and its people native or foreigners urgently i never smelled the just strong smells anytime anywhere it was horrible to see entire families swimming on beach that smelled so bad obviously we came back to our town sick of our stomach im not exaggerating im mexican and i have visited lot of mexican small towns and i have used latrines and that kind of third world stuff but the problem here is real im so sorry if you have planned to visit sayulita but i do not recomend to visit it not as today april maybe you are thinking why dont you just mind your own business well because i did not want part of the problem and i dont want you to be part of it eitherme da pena tristeza tener poner reseña así pueblo mexicano gente colores justifican mal olor suciedad fauna muerta tocaron ver peces mantarayas muertas basura doquier urgente gobierno habitantes locales extranjeros hagan respecto claro visitantes increíble nunca haber olido marsolo olores malos todas horas pueblo puede gente desechos horrible ver cómo gente nadaba agua olía mal familias completas obviamente regresamos enfermos investigando foros sayulita pudimos leer enferman visitan día menos tercer cuarto día extranjera piel delgada viajado pueblos méxico usar letrina baño seco problema real siento planeado viaje verdad recomiendo ahorita abril mucha gente dirá bueno decir digas creo caso aplica quiero ser parte problema ojalá tampoco quieras serlo
